description:
As Doc is enjoying another peaceful afternoon drinking coffee at Miss Melba`s café, he`s suddenly pulled underground through a manhole by a tentacled beast. This monster of the underground water system is know as the Devil Fish Kraken, and it just happens to love coffee, so it was attracted to Doc`s coffee-saturated scent. Seth and Melie head underground to save him, but Seth`s attacks have no effect on the beast`s soft body.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ce qui se cache dans les égouts
Chika Suidou ni Hisomu Mono: Monster
The Beast of the Underground Water System: Monster
